name: ani-grenoble-games-client
description: Client for the Ani Grenoble games

scripts.build: tsc --build src/app && tsc --build src/user/js && tsc --build src/admin/js && copyfiles -f src/user/html/**/*.html app_dist/user/html/ && copyfiles -f src/admin/html/**/*.html app_dist/admin/html/

author: Gael GC
